original_text: On the tenth day of the seventh month, Israel's people must not eat any food. This is a rule that you must obey for all time. The people who are travelling with them must not eat any food. None of them must do any work.
korean_text: 너희는 영원히 이 규례를 지킬지니라 일곱째 달 곧 그 달 십일에 너희는 스스로 괴롭게 하고 아무 일도 하지 말되 본토인이든지 너희 중에 거류하는 거류민이든지 그리하라

sentences.original_text: On the tenth day of the seventh month
Israel's people must not eat any food
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 백성은 어떤 음식도 먹어서는 안 됩니다

sentences.original_text: This is a rule that you must obey
The people who are travelling with them
None of them must do any work
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 아무도 어떤 일도 해서는 안 됩니다
